page.title: 07A TYPICAL SATURDAY
page.content: On Saturday I get up at 7.00am and watch television for one hour. Then I get dressed and have my breakfast. Then I have my wash and go to town with my mother and sister. We get fish and chips for our dinner and eat them in town. We spend the rest of the morning shopping. Then we come home. In the afternoon I jog around Fossetts and Chancers. This takes 23 minutes. After I have finished jogging I play football with my friends for the rest of the afternoon. After tea I watch television for the rest of the evening. I go to bed at nine.
